original_title: Im Schatten des Windes - Ein Tal im Wandel
overview: Ever since electricity began its triumphal march into homes, there have been conflicts about its origin and use. At the beginning the country was covered by a black cloud of coal-fired power plants. When people realised that this harms the environment, new technologies were developed to generate electricity. In the year 2020, there are still people who oppose against more environmentally friendly options. Why?
title: Wind of Changes
